_description: Rescale an image so that minimum side is equal to max_size, keeping the aspect ratio of the initial image.
name: SmallestMaxSize

max_size._description: Maximum size of smallest side of the image after the transformation.

interpolation._description: Flag that is used to specify the interpolation algorithm. Should be one of: 0 (cv2.INTER_NEAREST), 1 (cv2.INTER_LINEAR), 2 (cv2.INTER_CUBIC), 3 (cv2.INTER_AREA), 4 (cv2.INTER_LANCZOS4).

always_apply._description: If true, the augmentation is always applied.
